msbt.message: Thanks for the birthday present the other day! It was an awesome surprise. Well, I don't wanna be outdone when it comes to gifting, so take this!
I was so happy to get the birthday present you sent me! I'm lucky to have you as a friend. Gift giving is sort of like tennis. You served, and now I'm returning!
Thanks for the cool b-day present! Your feelings shone through. I've got something for you in return, so please take it. It's infused with my muscular sense of gratitude!
Thank you for remembering my birthday. I won't forget your birthday either. I'd bet my barbells on it!
Thanks for the birthday card. Your message made me feel like I can do anything, so I think I'm gonna get that gold medal, right after I bench press my house!
What a birthday card! Your words really touched my heart, which was awesome for my evening cardio session! It got me so pumped! Thanks a ton!
